name: Fling Birds
description:
Fling Birds is a great app with cute characters that you will love.
It features physics based game play and endless hours of replay value.
The little birds need to unite with their friends. Can u help them out?
Use the slingshot to get the birdies together.
Match three or more birds of the same color to make them shoot up.
Keep playing till you clear all the birdies present on the screen.
Make way for more points by clearing more number of birds at a time.
Be cautious: The game will get over if all the birdies reach the surface.
Clear the screen before they hit the ground.
Aim, fling and score in this exciting game.
Features:
• Impressive graphics and good gameplay
• Offers hours of entertainment
• 8 different colored birds
